Text: What conversion settings do you use?  I want to add some home improvement shows but they are way too large for what they are.

@crabman61: ez doesnt really rip or encode their releases, they only bring us what the scene groups release. Just google x264 or videolan, VLC is a great player and has encoding software packaged along with it.

Thanks for the soup again btw, tpb hasn't had enough quality releases of it in a while, or in a timely manner.
